revised_title: Exploring Ancient Greek Music Modes and Tones
tldr: The author examines the two distinct doctrines of ancient Greek music modes and tones, aiming to show their agreement under a common interpretation. They explain the harmonic and musical doctrines, discuss the seven modes admitted by Ptolemy, and provide insights into the origin and understanding of these doctrines by ancient writers.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Music History
